structure.unit: ACQUISITION AND DEVELOPMENT OF PUBLIC PROJECTS THROUGH REVENUE BONDS

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 13, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 375, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 213, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). In subsection (5) of this statute, the Reviser of Statutes has changed a reference to "KRS 45A.345(26)" to read "KRS 45A.345(27)," in order to correct an error resulting from the renumbering of subsections in 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 12, and ch. 375, sec. 2. See KRS 7.136(1)(e) and (h).
